Npc1027:
ï¿½Hey, talking to people at another table in a restaurant is like...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½breaking into their room and checking their drawers for valuables.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Yeah, other people on important adventures do such things,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½but you have to admit that it's bizarre![HALT][END]
